data.title: The Prometheus Deception by Ludlum, Robert: BOOK NEW Hard Cover (2000) 1st Edition., Signed by Author
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780312253462 - Signed by Author - 1st Edition. - Hard Cover - St Martins Press, New York - 2000 - Condition: BOOK NEW - DUSTJACKET NEW - SIGNED BY THE AUTHOR on a special, decorative bookplate. AN EXTREMELY CLEAN, ATTRACTIVE COPY WITH A BRIGHT, BEAUTIFUL DUSTJACKET IN NEW, GLOSSY BRODART. 1st printing. HANDSOME, COLLECTIBLE COPY. No previous owner markings or remainder marks. Original price of $27.95 still present on dustjacket flap. 507 pages. Author's last novel before his passing in 2001. PRISTINE, COLLECTIBLE COPY IN GIFT GIVING CONDITION. - The Prometheus Deception
